episodes.title: Ex-Scientologist Leah Remini reveals the secrets of the Celebrity Centre | BBC Sounds
episodes.description:
Actor and ex-Scientologist Leah Remini tells Louis Theroux about the Celebrity Centre and Scientology's purification rundown. 

Taken from BBC Radio 4's podcast Grounded with Louis Theroux, Louis talks to actor Leah Remini who reveals what it's really like inside the most exclusive parts of the Scientology Celebrity Centre, which is reserved for the likes of Tom Cruise. She recalls the moment she was allowed access, and all the perks that come with it. 

Leah also then gives the purification rundown, and what she did in the name of Scientology.
